text: Shirley Johnson (December 14, 1937 â€“ January 14, 2021) was an American politician. She was a member of the Republican Party. Johnson was born in Detroit, Michigan. From 1981 to 1992 and 1993 to 1998, Johnson was a member of the Michigan House of Representatives. From 1999 to 2004, she was a member of the Michigan Senate. Johnson died on January 14, 2021 in Royal Oak, Michigan at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Detroit Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Shirley Johnson
